report.title: Occurrences Download (standard filters, GIS support, no locality)
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters with additional columns for export to KML/GPX files and GIS. Does not include a locality column such as a vice county so suitable for datasets without indexed location layers.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: warehouse_id
param.description: Unique identifier code for the warehouse which can be prepended to occurrence IDs to make a globally unique record key

column.name: recordkey
column.sql: '#warehouse_id#' || o.id

column.name: name
column.sql: case when cttl.preferred_taxon=coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, '') then cttl.preferred_taxon else cttl.preferred_taxon || case when cttl.default_common_name is null then '' else ' - ' || cttl.default_common_name end end

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || snf.survey_title || coalesce(' | ' || snf.group_title, '')

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null then o.sample_id else null end

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null and onf.privacy_precision is null then o.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: lat
column.sql: substring(st_astext(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) from E'POINT\\(.+ (.+)\\)')

column.name: long
column.sql: substring(st_astext(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) from E'POINT\\((.+) ')

column.name: projection
column.sql: case snf.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(snf.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: get_sref_precision(snf.public_entered_sref, snf.entered_sref_system, snf.attr_sref_precision)

column.name: output_sref_projection
column.sql: case onf.output_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(onf.output_sref_system) end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: rtrim(snf.recorders, ', ')

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_full_name IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE onf.attr_det_last_name || COALESCE(', ' || onf.attr_det_first_name, '') END ELSE onf.attr_det_full_name END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE o.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: zeroabundance
column.sql: upper(cast (o.zero_abundance as character))

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Accepted' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Unconfirmed' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: record_substatus
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 1 THEN 'correct' WHEN 2 THEN 'Considered correct' ELSE NULL END WHEN 'C' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 3 THEN 'Plausible' ELSE 'Not reviewed' END WHEN 'R' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 4 THEN 'Unable to verify' WHEN 5 THEN 'Incorrect' ELSE NULL END ELSE NULL END

column.name: query
column.sql: case o.query when 'A' then 'Answered' when 'Q' then 'Queried' end

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: geom
column.sql: st_astext(st_transform(o.public_geom, 4326))

column.name: point_geom
column.sql: st_astext(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326))
